fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Beggar: Every time you enter a limited room, you get the room benefit and not count toward the room total.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Storm: Pick a room. Anyone who tries to enter that room will instead enter another available room. [1 uses, Unique, Day-Only]
- Mob: Pick a room available in this Night phase. Everyone who enters that room will take 1 HP Unblockable damage at the end of the phase. Does not apply to players affected by Storm. [2 uses, 2 CD, Day-Only]
- Steal: Take all of the benefits of the current room for yourself. Can only be used in limited rooms. [1 use, Unique]
